meanings.definition: One of the main divisions of a book, typically with a number or title.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed reading the exciting chapters of the adventure book.
meanings.sent2: The chapters in this novel are well-structured and engaging.
meanings.sent3: The chapters in the cookbook made me hungry for new recipes.
meanings.sent4: Each chapter in life is like a new beginning, full of surprises.
meanings.sent5: The chapters of the story unfolded like petals of a blooming flower.

meanings.definition: A local branch of a society or organization.
meanings.sent1: The new chapters of the charity organization are making a positive impact.
meanings.sent2: I attended a meeting at the local chapters of the book club.
meanings.sent3: The chapters of the gardening club host fun plant-swapping events.
meanings.sent4: The chapters of the environmental group work together to protect wildlife.
meanings.sent5: Joining the chapters of the community center helped me meet new friends.

meanings.definition: A period of time or an event in someone's life.
meanings.sent1: The chapters of childhood are filled with memories of innocence.
meanings.sent2: Each chapter of my journey has taught me valuable lessons.
meanings.sent3: The chapters of the family reunion were filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: As I entered a new chapter in life, I felt a sense of excitement.
meanings.sent5: The chapters of history reveal the stories of our ancestors.
